version_description:
-added "optimized mode" for older iPads. Accessible through options menu, improves frame rate on older iPads (3 and 4)
-fixed UI bug specific to iPad Mini 4
-fixed some text for various languages
-credit roll can now be skipped by mashing
-Support added for larger screen sizes on iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max and iPhone XR
- Fix for a bug that crashes the game before the very end
